title: Football Scoreboard Plugin Configuration
description: Configuration schema for the Football Scoreboard plugin - displays live, recent, and upcoming NFL and NCAA Football games

enabled.description: Enable or disable the football scoreboard plugin

display_duration.description: Duration in seconds for the display controller to show this plugin mode before rotating to next plugin

update_interval.description: How often to fetch new data in seconds

favorite_teams.description: List of favorite NFL team abbreviations (e.g., TB, DAL, GB). Use 2-3 letter codes.

display_modes.title: Display Modes
display_modes.description: Control which game types to show and how they are displayed

live_display_mode.description: Display mode for live games: 'switch' shows one game at a time, 'scroll' scrolls all games horizontally

recent_display_mode.description: Display mode for recent games: 'switch' shows one game at a time, 'scroll' scrolls all games horizontally

upcoming_display_mode.description: Display mode for upcoming games: 'switch' shows one game at a time, 'scroll' scrolls all games horizontally

scroll_settings.title: Scroll Settings
scroll_settings.description: Settings for scroll display mode (when display mode is set to 'scroll')

scroll_speed.description: Scroll speed in pixels per second

scroll_delay.description: Delay between scroll frames in seconds (lower = smoother)

gap_between_games.description: Gap in pixels between game cards when scrolling

show_league_separators.description: Show league icons (NFL shield, NCAA FB logo) between different leagues

dynamic_duration.description: Automatically calculate display duration based on content width

live_priority.description: Give live games priority over other modes. When enabled, live games will interrupt the normal mode rotation and be displayed immediately when available.

live_game_duration.description: Duration in seconds to display each live game before rotating to the next live game

recent_game_duration.description: Duration in seconds to show each recent game before rotating to the next game (default: 15 seconds).

upcoming_game_duration.description: Duration in seconds to show each upcoming game before rotating to the next game (default: 15 seconds).

live_update_interval.description: How often to update live game data (seconds)

game_limits.title: Game Limits
game_limits.description: Control how many games to show

recent_games_to_show.description: With favorite teams: Number of recent games PER team (e.g., 1 with 2 teams = 2 games). Without favorite teams: Total number of most recent games to show (e.g., 5 = show 5 most recent games total).

upcoming_games_to_show.description: With favorite teams: Number of upcoming games PER team (e.g., 2 with 3 teams = up to 6 games). Without favorite teams: Total number of next upcoming games to show (e.g., 1 = show only the next 1 game total).

show_favorite_teams_only.description: Only show games from favorite teams

show_all_live.description: Show all live games, not just favorites

dynamic_duration.title: NFL Dynamic Duration Settings
dynamic_duration.description: Configure dynamic duration settings for NFL games.

enabled.description: Enable dynamic duration for NFL games

modes.title: Per-Mode Settings for NFL
modes.description: Configure dynamic duration for specific NFL modes

enabled.description: Enable dynamic duration for NFL live games

max_duration_seconds.description: Max duration for NFL live games

enabled.description: Enable dynamic duration for NFL recent games

max_duration_seconds.description: Max duration for NFL recent games

enabled.description: Enable dynamic duration for NFL upcoming games

max_duration_seconds.description: Max duration for NFL upcoming games

mode_durations.title: Mode-Level Durations
mode_durations.description: Control total duration for each mode type for this league. If not set, uses dynamic calculation (total_games × per_game_duration).

recent_mode_duration.description: Total duration in seconds for Recent mode before rotating to next mode. If not set, uses dynamic calculation. When mode cycles back, continues from last game shown (no repetition).

upcoming_mode_duration.description: Total duration in seconds for Upcoming mode before rotating to next mode. If not set, uses dynamic calculation. When mode cycles back, continues from last game shown (no repetition).

live_mode_duration.description: Total duration in seconds for Live mode before rotating to next mode. If not set, uses dynamic calculation. When mode cycles back, continues from last game shown (no repetition).
